attributes.action: Suspend pay for N.I. politicians who do not to attend Assembly meetings.
attributes.background: The people of Northern Ireland are tired by the counterproductive and obstructive behaviors of some of those elected to the Assembly.  If a person decides not to attend their place of work, or engage in working collaboratively; they should not continue to be supported at taxpayer expense!

rejection.details:
The salaries of MLAs are determined by the Independent Financial Review Panel not by the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out more about the IFRP here:

http://ifrp.org.uk/
